dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: Cora is a citation dataset where each node represents a document and the edges indicate the citation relations. Each node is provided with a multi-dimensional binary attribute vector, where each dimension indicates the presence of a word from a dictionary in the publication.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: Citeseer is a citation dataset similar to Cora, where each node represents a document and the edges indicate the citation relations. Each node is provided with a multi-dimensional binary attribute vector.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: J. McAuley
C. Targett
Q. Shi
A. Van Den Hengel
dcterms:description: Amazon-Photos is from the Amazon co-purchase graph where nodes represent products and edges are between pairs of products frequently purchased together. Products are classed into eight classes, and node attributes are a bag-of-words representation of a productâ€™s reviews.
dcterms:title: Amazon-Photos

dcterms:creator: J. McAuley
C. Targett
Q. Shi
A. Van Den Hengel
dcterms:description: Amazon-Computers is another dataset from the Amazon co-purchase graph, similar to Amazon-Photos, where nodes represent products and edges indicate frequent co-purchases. Each product is classified into a category.
dcterms:title: Amazon-Computers

dcterms:creator: J. Pennington
R. Socher
C. Manning
dcterms:description: WikiCS is a dataset for graph-based learning tasks, containing Wikipedia articles and their links. Each node represents an article, and the edges represent hyperlinks between them.
dcterms:title: WikiCS

dcterms:creator: A. Sinha
Z. Shen
Y. Song
H. Ma
D. Eide
B.-J. P. Hsu
K. Wang
dcterms:description: CoauthorCS is a dataset that contains information about authors and their publications in the field of computer science. Each node represents an author, and edges represent co-authorship relationships.
dcterms:title: CoauthorCS
